pftoolsV3
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which pftoolsV3 installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using pftoolsV3, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load pftoolsV3/3.2.11-GCCcore-10.3.0
```
